page.title: 20KELVIN HALL SCHOOL.
page.content: {Kelvin Hall}is a school for pupils aged 13-18. It is a medium sized school and has about{840 pupils.} It has an artificial cricket pitch, tennis courts, a well equipped gymnasium, rugby, football and hockey pitches. There is a four hundred metre track,throwing circles and jumping pits and a large field which we share with our neighbouring school, Wyke. We have lots of sports teams. We have about{50 teachers,}including a Headmistress. Our lessons last for 70 minutes (double) or 35 minutes (single).{School begins at 8.45 a.m.} and we have morning break at 10.30. The dinner hour is from 11.55 until 13.15 and we{finish school at 15.45.} We have a school orchestra and this year there is to be a school production of "Oliver".
